traits.presence_at_crucifixion: Named with Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of James the younger and of Joses as watching from a distance when Jesus is crucified.
traits.support_in_galilee: Identified as one of the women who had followed Jesus and provided for him when he was in Galilee.
traits.role_at_tomb: Appears among the women who go to the tomb early on the first day of the week to anoint Jesus’s body and who hear the message of his resurrection.
traits.narrative_profile: Functions as part of Mark’s group of faithful women disciples who witness the passion and are entrusted with the initial resurrection announcement.
